sub_title: US and Dutch Expatriate Tax Advisor & Managing Director at Rubes US Tax Services
summary:
Welcome to my Linkedin profile,

Please feel free to contact me at info@rubestax.com or 020-2380330.

We can assist expatriates, foreign nationals and employers in- and out-side the Netherlands in minimising tax liabilities and reducing expenses relating to cross-border employment situations and international assignments, by offering tailored, personal, client-focused and professional Dutch & US tax, immigration and consultancy advisory services at the highest quality and service levels, and at attractive rates.

By using short communication lines, attractive and transparent fee structures and an expert hands on approach, our focus is not only on providing the best advice and answers. Our focus is also very much on communication as well as managing and meeting the expectations that our clients have from an expert service provider. 
We have a diverse portfolio of clients and offer a wide range of services: from preparing income tax returns to higher-end complicated cross border employment tax services, including second opinions to high executives.

We can address relevant issues both at corporate and at expatriate level and  provide practical, efficient solutions to meet specific objectives of foreign nationals as well as companies with internationally mobile employees.

Specialties: Dutch income tax as well as US federal and state income tax, specifically the combined approach and integration of these tax systems
